name: The undead obsession
description:
A zombie awakens in the dead of night craving but one thing

Gambling

No robot can keep him away from it

follow the moon to the gas station

once you have the lottery ticket you can return to your eternal slumber

Note : if your screen freezes it didn't crash you died. reload to restart

other Note: if you happen to have an xbox controller lying around try it out with this game

but remember to pace yourself
